												A blatant copy of Fruit Ninja, and with almost no replayability. Timer starts, and you must destroy flying candies that are fired from cannons in front of you. Some of these fly outside your playarea, so if you try to hit them, you are going to hit something in your room. I know I did.There is only one gamemode, and nothing else. Game works and runs fine, but I wouldn't buy it.Fruit Ninja VR is the same price, and it is way better.

												Discount Fruit Ninja. Store page doesn't specify required room size so beware. Even with my 3.1x2.8m room scale, I still go out boundaries and accidentally hit a wall.There's no boundary or indicator on where's the limit on the candies you need to hit. Dev needs to restrict the space where the candies fly off. This game also suffers with poor hit detection when moving your controller fast enough (happens on some sports game where you hit a ball)I got this in a bundle so whatever, will only buy this full price if it was priced around $3. If you want a better game, get fruit ninja, if you want a hardcore version, get zenblade
